Announcements/Map 4 Reset.title: Map 4 Reset
Announcements/Map 4 Reset.description: Well well well, it’s that time again… OGCraft is resetting its map!

Announcements/Map 5 Reset.title: Map 5 Reset
Announcements/Map 5 Reset.description: Is it that time already? Yes it is! OGCraft is resetting its map!

Announcements/Map 6 Reset.title: Map 6 Reset
Announcements/Map 6 Reset.description: Can you believe it? Map 6 is already up and here we are heading into Map 7. This will be the first official map where OGCraft and Pioneer players start together at the same time and progress together under one roof!

Announcements/Map 7 Reset.title: Map 7 Reset
Announcements/Map 7 Reset.description: Well that’s it folks, our longest map is coming to an end. After a staggering 10 months, Map 7 will be officially closing.

Events/3rd Birthday Celebration.title: 🎂 3rd Birthday Celebration
Events/3rd Birthday Celebration.description: In one month’s time—August 15, 2023—we will be celebrating OGCraft’s 3rd Birthday! This year, we’re bringing back fan-favorite minigames, unveiling a brand-new custom built challenge, and giving away over $100 in store prizes!

Events/Base Building Bonanza.title: 🛠️ Base Building Bonanza
Events/Base Building Bonanza.description: With the first month done and Fly and other goodies unlocked, it's time we got you to show off your bases!

Info/Host A Server.title: 🖥 Host A Server
Info/Host A Server.description: Looking to spin up your own Minecraft server? We’ve partnered with EnviroMC for years to provide reliable, high-performance hosting.

Info/Rules.title: 📜 Rules
Info/Rules.description: Disclaimer: This list is not exhaustive and cannot cover every possible scenario or edge case. If you’re ever unsure whether something is allowed, please ask a staff member for clarification before proceeding.

Welcome.title: Welcome To OGCraft
Welcome.description: We’re a Chill, toggle-PvP, non-grief freebuild Minecraft server running 1.21.4.

Wiki/Chat Colors.title: Chat Formatting & Colors
Wiki/Chat Colors.description: Customize your in-game chat messages, nicknames, and signs with Minecraft’s built-in color & formatting codes. Use the ampersand (&) followed by the code character to apply.

Wiki/Duping Policy.title: Duping Policy
Wiki/Duping Policy.description: Welcome to the official dupe policy page. Below you'll find a clear breakdown of what types of duplication are allowed and which are strictly prohibited on the server.

Wiki/Mod Policy.title: Client Mod Policy
Wiki/Mod Policy.description: We want players to enjoy the game their way, as long as it's fair. This mod policy outlines what's allowed and what isn't when it comes to client-side modifications.

Wiki/Player Warp Rules.title: Player Warp Rules
Wiki/Player Warp Rules.description: Under Construction: We’re updating PWarp rules—below are the current guidelines.

Wiki/Ranks.title: Rank Information
Wiki/Ranks.description: This page is under construction as we revise permissions
